I came out as gay to my work colleagues and some of my friends several years ago. I came out to my family last year. Everyone is so supportive. But it still feels like I‚Äôm living a double life because I don‚Äôt discuss it publicly.

I‚Äôm changing that, starting now üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåà Happy #pride !

content.html: It's been a year since I posted this. The amount of progress I've made becoming more comfortable with myself in 1 year is amazing. Happy #Pride2022 !
